item.title: Emails, Meetings and Slacks Are an Essential Part of Your Office Job
item.description: Emails, Meetings, and Slack: Essential Tools for the Modern Office Emails, meetings, and Slack are all essential tools for the modern office. They can be used to communicate, collaborate, and stay organized. Emails are a quick and easy way to communicate with people who are not in the same room as you.
